    • Uses of BrokerServerException in suncertify.client

      Methods in suncertify.client that throw BrokerServerException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int ClientController.addRecord(ContractorRecord record)
      This method adds a new record to the database on behalf of the client associated with this controller.
      void ClientController.bookRecord(ContractorRecord record)
      This method forwards a record booking request to the database server.
      void ClientController.deleteRecord(ContractorRecord record)
      This method relays the call to delete from the database the record uniquely identified by the integer value parameter value.
      ContractorRecord[] ClientController.findRecords(ContractorRecord criteria)
      This method forwards record search request to the database server.
      static ClientController ClientController.getController(AppRunMode mode)
      This method provides the mechanism for the creation of Controller objects.
      ContractorRecord ClientController.getRecord(int recNo)
      This method returns an array of String objects denoting the attributes of the record uniquely identified by the integer record number in the parameter.
      void ClientController.releaseRecord(ContractorRecord record)
      This method forwards a record release request to the database server.
      void ClientController.updateRecord(ContractorRecord oldVal, ContractorRecord newVal)
      This method forwards requests to update a record to the DB server.

      This is an abstract method that must be implemented in the subclasses of this class.
      void BrokerRMIServer.stopServer()
      This method performs the process of suspending the RMI server if the server is up and running.
